cast.overview: When Van Helsing's mysterious invention, the "Monsterfication Ray," goes haywire, Drac and his monster pals are all transformed into humans, and Johnny becomes a monster. In their new mismatched bodies, Drac and Johnny must team up and race across the globe to find a cure before it's too late, and before they drive each other crazy.
cast.title: Hotel Transylvania: Transformania

details.biography: Brian Hull is an American actor, impersonator, and youtuber. Famous for imitating many cartoon characters, including those from Disney in video and in front of the characters at Disneyland. He quickly gained attention when his YouTube video “Disney and Pixar Sings Let it Go” went viral. Many animation studios, including Walt Disney Studios, took an interest in him and he is now pursuing a career as a voice actor.
details.name: Brian Hull
